author: Hemant Mehta
title: Filmmakers Now Have an Easy Way to Get the Science Right in Their Movies
text:
We know there are times when movies get scientific facts completely wrong — and it’s embarrassing. 
To prevent that from happening nowadays, there’s actually a way for filmmakers to get in touch with scientists who can answer their questions to avoid any problems down the road. 
I didn’t know it existed, but I’m thrilled that it does since, as the video below shows, the way scientists are portrayed in movies has a direct impact on how people view the subject. 
Can someone give the hotline number to Republicans in Washington? 
(Thanks to Ed for the link)
